creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: recto: pair of overlapping blue shaded diamonds with vertical wavy lines, ULC; grey square with scalloped edges, one green-bordered vertical wavy line, and one pink-bordered vertical wavy line with Japanese and English text, in LLC; black diamond connected with grey shaded rectangle, URC; grey diamond at half-shaded sideways rectangle in LRQ; numbers and Japanese text in URQ; verso: English text and math equations with rectangle
medium: Colored pencil, pencil, and ink on paper
title: Untitled [motif from "Meditation"]
